text: Service is through Betfair. You can try talking to your account manager or BDP if you’re interested in getting access to the API. Not sure how many more licenses they have open though.

elements.text: Service is through Betfair. You can try talking to your account manager or BDP if you’re interested in getting access to the API. Not sure how many more licenses they have open though.

text: Or if you want to go direct to source - the company is called TPD. They charge per meeting. It costs around £30-70 per meeting.
